data.code:
window.logManager.consoleLog(
  'inline_function: button_yesterday - page Visits', 
  'info'
)

cti.fn_toggle_spinner('open', 'Loading Yesterday\'s Appointment Data...')

var newDisplayDate = moment().subtract(1, 'days').format("YYYY-MM-DD")

cti.store.variables.v_appointmentDate = newDisplayDate
cti.store.variables.v_appointmentDateText = 'Yesterday'

cti.fn_load_appointments()

cti.utils.updatePage()
$success()

window.logManager.consoleLog(
  'inline_function: button_today - page Visits', 
  'info'
)

cti.fn_toggle_spinner('open', 'Loading Today\'s Appointment Data...')

var newDisplayDate = moment().format("YYYY-MM-DD")
cti.store.variables.v_appointmentDate = newDisplayDate
cti.store.variables.v_appointmentDateText = 'Today'

cti.fn_load_appointments()

cti.utils.updatePage()
$success()

window.logManager.consoleLog(
  'inline_function: button_tomorrow - page Visits', 
  'info'
)

cti.fn_toggle_spinner('open', 'Loading Tomorrow\'s Appointment Data...')

var newDisplayDate = moment().add(1, 'days').format("YYYY-MM-DD")
cti.store.variables.v_appointmentDate = newDisplayDate
cti.store.variables.v_appointmentDateText = 'Tomorrow'

cti.fn_load_appointments()

cti.utils.updatePage()
$success()

"Progress Note: " + $data.$item.progressNoteType.value + ", " + $data.$item.progressNoteSubType.value : ""}} {{$data.$item.eventType == "appointments" ? "Appointment: " + $data.$item.type + " with " + $data.$item.hcpSurname + ", " + $data.$item.hcpForename + " " + $data.$item.hcpTitle : ""}} {{$data.$item.eventType == "alerts-added" ? "Alert Added" : ""}} {{$data.$item.eventType == "alerts-removed" ? "Alert Removed" : ""}} {{$data.$item.eventType == "allergies" ? "Allergy Added" : ""}}

"Type: " + $data.$item.documentType.value : ""}} {{$data.$item.eventType == "referral" ? $data.$item.urgency.value + " referral to service " + $data.$item.specialty.value : ""}} {{$data.$item.eventType == "alerts-added" ? $data.$item.type.value : ""}} {{$data.$item.eventType == "alerts-removed" ? $data.$item.displayText : ""}} {{$data.$item.eventType == "allergies" ? $data.$item.substance : ""}}

content.name: preDialogText
content.content:
This form must be completed at point of entry into the service, at regular intervals throughout clinical contact and at discharge.

In all scenarios the answer to the question 'Does the service user want help?' should be completed by the service user.

Occasionally the clinician's view may be different to that of the service user or the service user may lack the capacity to decide.
In both cases the box most likely to represent the service user's views should be ticked.

The free text box should then be used to provide reasons for the service user's view followed by the views of the professional or family if different.

When discussing and creating an action plan please follow steps 1-3 for each area you agree to discuss today:

Step 1: Understanding - why this rating and not a lower one? - what is working?

Step 2: Looking forward - best case scenario? - smallest improvement?

Step 3: Considering options - what can the patient do? - what can the clinician do? - what can others do?

Pre Assessment Questions

options.label: Short term support to max independence

content.name: MHRecovery
content.label: What recovery means to me? My long term goals.  What I would like to achieve in 12 months time.

content.name: MHSkills
content.label: My skills, strengths and experiences that will help me achieve my goals

content.name: RCYN
content.label: Does the Lead Clinician agree to this care plan?

content.name: SUYN
content.label: Does the service user agree with this care plan?

content.name: SUDisagree
content.label: Please state who has agreed to this plan:

options.label: Setting change- move to residential care
Setting change- move to nursing care
Short term support to max independence
Same location long term support increase
Same location and same long term support
Same location long term support decrease
Same location suspend long term support
Same location long term support ended

content.name: Funded
content.label: If this client is receiving a package of care, who is responsible for funding?

content.name: S117Comm
content.label: Details of funded elements of the care plan including S117 aftercare:

content.name: html_banner
content.content:
{{'$store.variables.selected_visit.displayName' | store}}

DOB
{{'$store.variables.selected_visit.patientData.demographics.birthDate' | store | date:mediumDate}} ({{'$store.variables.selected_visit.age' | store}}y)
Gender
{{'$store.variables.selected_visit.patientData.demographics.gender.value' | store}}
NHS Number
NHS
{{'$store.variables.selected_visit.nhsNumFormatted' | store}}
Alerts

data.code:
var response = $data.$response

window.logManager.consoleLog(
  'API CALL: submitsafetyform FAILED - Reason: ' + response.message, 
  'error'
)

// Notifiy user of failed submission
cti.utils.callAction("show-notification", {
  "name": "notification_error", 
  "title" : "Server Connection Error", 
  "text" : "Unable to submit Safety Form: " + response.message
})

// Set status to failed
cti.store.variables.selected_visit.safety_form_status = "failed"
cti.store.variables.selected_visit.safety_form_status_text = "Failed to Upload My Safety Plan, tap to retry..."

delete cti.store.variables.v_submitSafetyFormPayload
delete cti.store.offlineApi.api_rio_offline.submitsafetyform

cti.utils.updatePage()

window.logManager.consoleLog(
  'API Call: push/pushDeregister SUCCESS', 
  'info'
);

cti.store.variables.registeredPushId = ''
cti.store.variables.temp_user = ''

$success()

var response = $data.$response

window.logManager.consoleLog('API CALL: addprogressnote FAILED - Reason: ' + response.message, 'error')

cti.utils.callAction('show-notification', {
  name: 'notification_error',
  title: 'Server Error: Add Progress Note',
  text: 'Unable to connect to the server: ' + response.message || 'No message returned'
})

if (cti.store.media && cti.store.media.btnPhoto && cti.store.media.btnPhoto.base64) {
  delete cti.store.media.btnPhoto.base64
  delete cti.store.media.btnPhoto.fileExtension
}

delete cti.store.api.api_rio.addprogressnote
delete cti.store.variables.v_progressNoteToAdd

$success()

console.log('AddHCPAppointment: Success', $data)

$success()

console.log('AddHCPAppointment: Fail', $data)

$success()

window.logManager.consoleLog(
  'API Call: getdocument - Sending...', 
  'info'
)

$success()

var response = cti.store.api.api_rio.getdocument

window.logManager.consoleLog(
  'API Call: getdocument - FAILED - Reason: ' + response.message, 
  'info'
)

cti.utils.callAction("show-notification", {
  "name": "notification_error", 
  "title" : "Server Connection Error", 
  "text" : "Get Document Failed: " + response.message || "No message returned"
})

delete cti.store.variables.v_documentGetPayload
delete cti.store.variables.v_selectedDocument
delete cti.store.api.api_rio.getdocument

cti.fn_toggle_spinner('close')

window.logManager.consoleLog(
  'API Call: getappointments - Sending...', 
  'info'
)

//Set the date range to sync -1, +1
cti.store.variables.v_appointmentSyncFromDate = moment().subtract(1, 'days').format("YYYY-MM-DD")
cti.store.variables.v_appointmentSyncToDate = moment().add(1, 'days').format("YYYY-MM-DD")

$success()

window.logManager.consoleLog('actionflow: RevokeAuthentication', 'info')

if (window.debug) {
  debugger
}

cti.store.variables.v_isAuthenticated = false

// Store a temp copy of the username for use within the deregister push call.
cti.store.variables.temp_user = cti.store.variables.loggedInUser
cti.store.variables.loggedInUser = ''

cti.fn_clearActivityTimeout()
cti.fn_stopActivityListener()

cti.fn_onAppResume()

$success()

cti.fn_clearActivityTimeout()

cti.store.variables.lastUserActivity = new Date().getTime()

console.log(`fn_startActivityListener:: Setting up user activity event listener...`)

cti.store.variables.timeoutTimer = setTimeout(function() {
  console.log(`Actionflow:UserActivity:: Hit activity timeout, off to PIN entry we go...`)
    
  cti.fn_clearActivityTimeout()
  cti.fn_stopActivityListener()
  
  cti.utils.callAction('go-to-page', { name: 'Enter_PIN' })
}, cti.store.variables.inactivityTimeout)

clearTimeout(cti.store.variables.timeoutTimer)

Toggles the page opened and closed based on the value
of the this.opened property (initially set to false)

attributes.name: message
attributes.description: A message to display whilst the spinner is showing

functions.name: startSpin

attributes.name: captureWidth
attributes.description: Width restriction on captured photos

attributes.name: captureHeight
attributes.description: Height restriction on captured photos

attributes.name: captureQuality
attributes.description: QUality setting for captured photos

attributes.name: captureCategory
attributes.description: Optional category identifier to assign to photos when captured.

attributes.name: displayCategory
attributes.description: Optional category on which to filter display of photos

attributes.name: maxPhotos
attributes.description: Maximum number of photos that can be captured in this category (default is 3)

events.name: captureComplete
events.description: Fired when a photo has been captured

events.name: editPhoto
events.description: Fired when user selects edit option

events.name: maxPhotosTaken
events.description: Fired when we have taken the maximum number of photos in this category

params.name: filename
params.description: A filename to allocate to the capture photo

params.name: id
params.description: The internal id of the photo to remove

attributes.name: questionText
attributes.description: Question description

attributes.name: selectedValue
attributes.description: Selected value to allow us to preselect if the value exists in the store

events.name: radioPressed
events.description: Emitted when a value changes in the component

events.name: connected
events.description: Emitted when the element has connected

attributes.name: readOnly
attributes.description: Question description

attributes.name: historicOnly
attributes.description: Whether we should only display historic data - i.e. no useable slider.

attributes.name: sliderID
attributes.description: id for the slider div to allow multiple per page

attributes.name: questionText
attributes.description: text to be displayed above the slider

attributes.name: rangeMin
attributes.description: lowest value on the slider

attributes.name: rangeMax
attributes.description: highest value on the slider

attributes.name: roundToSteps
attributes.description: bind function to round slider to closest step

attributes.name: currentDot
attributes.description: whether or not a 'current' dot should be rendered

attributes.name: previousDot
attributes.description: whether or not a 'previous' dot should be rendered

attributes.name: storeLocation
attributes.description: toggle to write slider data back to this location in the cti store

attributes.name: previousValue
attributes.description: pass the value entered in a previous dialog+ form to show second bar

attributes.name: debounceOverride
attributes.description: change the standard debounce from 500ms

events.name: connected
events.description: Emitted when the element has connected

events.name: disconnected
events.description: Emitted when the element has disconnected
